```{r lib}
library(cowplot)
library(ggtext)
library(glue)
library(here)
library(knitr)
library(tidyverse)
theme_set(theme_classic())
color_palette <- RColorBrewer::brewer.pal(4, "Dark2")
dataset_colors <- c(
  human = color_palette[[3]],
  marine = color_palette[[1]],
  mouse = color_palette[[4]],
  soil = color_palette[[2]]
)
set.seed(2018)
```
